function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in the delivery of construction materials due to lockdown.","Impact":"Slow progress of construction projects, leading to increased costs and potential financial losses.","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, stockpiling of critical materials, and establishing alternative supply chains.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time inventory tracking systems, and automated procurement systems.","People":"Construction companies, suppliers, and project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies and project managers."},{"Description":"Delay in completion of construction project due to lockdown and other safety measure.","Impact":"Increased project duration, additional costs, and potential contractual disputes with clients.","Mitigation":"Implementation of flexible project timelines, clear communication with clients, and renegotiation of project timelines and milestones.","Technologies":"Project management software, communication platforms, and scheduling tools.","People":"Construction companies, clients, and project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies and project managers."},{"Description":"Social distancing as a major challenge.","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased project duration, and heightened risk of disease transmission among workers.","Mitigation":"Reconfiguring worksites, implementing remote work where possible, and providing personal protective equipment (PPE) for workers.","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems, collaboration software, and wearable technology for contact tracing.","People":"Construction companies, workers, and project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies and project managers."}]}
